techmeme.title: OpenAI debuts Codex CLI, an open-source coding agent tool for terminals that links AI models with local code and computing tasks, like moving files (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
OpenAI launches o3, its most advanced reasoning model, and o4-mini, a lower cost alternative that still delivers "impressive results", for ChatGPT paid users (Igor Bonifacic/Engadget)
Apple says it has reduced its global greenhouse gas emissions by over 60% vs. 2015 levels as part of its commitment to reach full carbon neutrality by 2030 (Hartley Charlton/MacRumors)
Deezer says ~18% of songs uploaded to the service are AI-generated; 20K AI-generated songs are uploaded daily, nearly twice the number reported four months ago (Reuters)
Q&A with Phil Spencer on A Minecraft Movie, potential IP for future movies, Microsoft's Hollywood goals, Fallout Season 2 and the Minecraft TV series, and more (Jennifer Maas/Variety)
